name: Hermeto Pascoal
description: '''Hermeto Pascoal''' (born June 22, 1936) is a Brazilian composer and multi-instrumentalist. He was born in [[Lagoa da Canoa, Alagoas]], [[Brazil]]. Pascoal is best known in [[music of Brazil|Brazilian music]] for his orchestration and improvisation, as well as for being a [[record producer]] and contributor to many Brazilian and international albums.
